data.text: @markciuro @Kuba87494723 Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

Told you we are all about sustainability, didn't we? 😚 After our huge murals, we are once again doing something outstanding in Milan: check out our 15 #WIZZpink bike stations all over the city until the end of October! Happy travels! 🚲✈️ https://t.co/eYtqLi3L9F

data.text: @DorsetSpur Hi. You need to have in writing that the person applying for the claim has the authority to do that on behalf of the other passengers also. It can be written by hand and has to be signed by the passengers then attached to the claim as a photo.

@Arandjel777 Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

data.text: @Rob_Lennox Hi Robert! We're truly sorry for the delay and inconvenience. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible.

@colin14571535 Hi There!  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience. Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and our colleagues will check the booking and assist you. Thank you! https://t.co/Si8NTjzQh1. Thank you for your cooperation!

@DannyLew89 Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks
